entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update Templates to Make Developing a Maui Blazor MacCatalyst app a Better Experience #14219
  • Custom controls using handlers in MAUI app targetting .net not working #14213
  • Unintended focus control occurs in NavigationPage. #14211
    Backlog

Closed

  • [Android] [Regression] NavigationPage.TitleView with ScrollView causes: (1) crashes, and (2) blank pages with stuck ToolbarItems #13185
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Pressing next into a ListView or TableView goes to last element #13176
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.Maui.Devices.Flashlight: Check if supported #13458
    Backlog
  • XAML: IsVisible #11454
    Backlog
  • Android version code incorrect when publishing release build apk #11139
    Backlog
  • Android local pdf file path as source of webview is not displaying #14184
  • MSB4044: The "CompileAppManifest" task was not given a value for the required parameter "DefaultSdkVersion" #14189
  • Xamarin.Forms UWP CollectionView Memory leak #14194
  • When using SMS permission on Android ReceiveSms is always requested while it shouldn't #13446
    Backlog
  • FilePicker: Not possible to pick a file on an iPad-Pro Simulator with iOS 15.5 #9953
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [android] update gradle from 7.0.2 to 7.2 #14221
  • [iOS] Update CollectionView layout when reloading data #14218
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Use Background as Fill, if Fill is null in Shapes #14216
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Make .NET MAUI (Blazor) templates project based #14215
    area/templates 📄
  • [iOS] Ignore PushModal tests #14212
    do-not-merge

Merged

  • Fix next keyboard into a ListView and TableView iOS #13838
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, area/ListView, control-entry
  • Microsoft.Maui.Devices.Flashlight: Check if supported #13703
    t/breaking 💥, area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Comments/refactoring for clarification (#14176) #14217
    area/layout 🔲
  • Remove ReceiveSms added by default #14203

Updated

  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • Expose BlazorWebView.TryDispatchAsync() API for access to scoped services #13425
    area/blazor 🕸️, do-not-merge
  • Do not scroll for UIAlertControllers #14100
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • Strong name the build tasks for the IDE #14080
    area/tooling ⚙️
  • Essentials: Port Xamarin.MediaGallery #13564
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Code generation now supports internal duplicate types #14171
    area/Xaml </>
  • Updated Templates for Blazor apps for MacCatalyst #14196
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI
  • Improvements Droid Lifecycle #2669
    area/lifecycle 🔁, community ✨, .NET 8 Planning
  • [WIP] Add first draft color test #14180
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #14109
    area/image :framed_picture:
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Add TitleView to VisualChildren list for Page/Shell #14006
    area/shell 🐢
